items.text:
As you carefully make your way over the moss-dappled stones strewn
near the Fractured Wall, you hear a faint series of beeps and grunts.
Squinting, you spot a hunched figure intently studying a collapsed
chunk of the Fractured Wall. As you approach and get ready to
introduce yourself, he spins around to face you.

“—clearly mid to late twenty-second century design, if you look
at the interlacing carbon microfibers in the stone! You agree?” You
pause, unsure if he’s addressing you or himself. He grins. “Well? What
do you think?” Confused but intrigued, you take a look for yourself.
to ask him about his research.
